summary: The Chemical Tax Repeal Act, introduced in the Senate on February 18, 2025, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The bill proposes to repeal excise taxes on taxable chemicals and substances, specifically striking subchapters B and C of Chapter 38. The repeal would be effective starting January 1, 2025. This legislation is sponsored by Mr. Cruz and several other senators and has been referred to the Committee on Finance.
